title: [IOTDB-5176] Change ratis snapshot dir with datadir
body:
Currently, when user assigns a customized data_dir in iotdb-datanode.properties, the ratis snapshot dir is not updated with this customized value, so that there will be inconsistent snapshot dirs.
In this pr I propose to update ratis snapshot dir togather with data_dir.

title: [IOTDB-5205] Construct Cluster Node startup protocol
body:
Updates:

1. Construct Cluster Node startup protocol. The Cluster Node startup protocol is divided into NodeRegistration protocol and NodeRestart protocol. Each protocol has a different determination mechanism. You can see the design details in [Cluster Node startup protocol](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docx/BWAtdxAZ8oflr7xcJXncAAyAnMc) doc.
2. Improve DataNode startup process. I've reconstructed the startup code and improve the [DataNode startup process](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docs/doccnMgSBOgHqeT9gjs4RUrqTob#) doc, where I indicate the main purpose of each steps.
3. Improve ConfigNode startup process. The same as 2. Please see the [ConfigNode startup process](https://apache-iotdb.feishu.cn/docs/doccniPRgxESvXlekL0PuSiHolf#) doc.

All scenarios have been verified in integration-test. Please pay attention to the IoTDBClusterNodeErrorStartUpIT~

[To rel/1.0][IOTDB-5165]Failed to pass compaction validation
body:
**Description**
Throw the 'tsfiles overlap with each other' exception wrongly after compaction that don't actually have.

**Reason**
When part of TsFileResource is degraded from deviceTimeIndex to FileTimeIndex, an error will be reported.

**Solution**
Skip validating files with file time index.

title: [IOTDB-5165]Failed to pass compaction validation
body:
**Description**
Throw the 'tsfiles overlap with each other'  exception wrongly after compaction that don't actually have.

**Reason**
When part of TsFileResource is degraded from deviceTimeIndex to FileTimeIndex, an error will be reported.

**Solution**
Skip validating files with file time index.

title: [IOTDB-5162] Optimize concurrent schema fetch for same schema
body:
## Description


### Motivation

When there are different requests trying to fetch the same schema, for example concurrent data insertion for same device and concurrent data query for same timeseries, it's consuming to execute schema fetch for each request when all of them miss the cache.

### Modification

Implement device level schemaFetch concurrency control in new extracted ClusterSchemaFetchExecutor.

title: [To rel/1.0][IOTDB-5201][IOTDB-5223] Extract DataNode getConfig and add check for cross-disk directories
body:
## Description

Cherry pick from #8441 and #8469

title: [IOTDB-5153] Fix dead lock in confignode
body:
1. In register datanode, the trigger lock and udf lock are acquired sequentially.
2. In snapshot, this sequential order is not guaranteed. We have to guarantee the order to avoid dead lock.
